summary: Chester is back and better then ever! This is an upgrade from my first follower. He can now be found in The Bannered Mare in Whiterun getting Drunk and hooking up with the local strong Nord Women.
descriptionHtml:
An Upgrade of Chester. Who is a assassin and Dual wielding Badass! He has a few random items and a set of thieves guild armor (THAT HE STOLE!) so he's a pretty great follower. I've always felt they never had enough argonians in skyrim so I aimed to fix that! I plan on giving him custom armor and Weapons with a House (doubt it will happen) But I do plan on giving him a lot more detail.

Install: Download and install with NMM or manually download and unpack the file and then move the “data” folder to your Skyrim data folder. 

Uninstall: Uninstall with NMM or manually delete all the files that came in the “data” folder listed in the mod.
author: Hunterbuzz
